cart.addedToCart: {name} has been added to your cart.

product.easyContactDesc: Reach out anytime to me via email!
product.handmadeWithLoveDesc: Each bouquet is carefully handcrafted with love and attention to detail. Every piece is unique and specially made for you.
product.freshFlowersDesc: We use only the freshest and highest quality flowers to ensure your bouquet stays beautiful for as long as possible.
product.uniqueDesignDesc: No two bouquets are the same. Each arrangement has its own character and beauty that makes it truly special.
product.carefullyPackagedDesc: Your bouquet is expertly packaged to arrive safely so you can immediately gift it or display it with pride.
product.priceExplanationDesc: Felt flowers and regular flowers cannot be compared to each other. They differ in price, durability, and longevity. Felt flowers are labor-intensive to make—on average, I spend about an hour working on each flower. There are also material costs involved. This is why felt flowers are more expensive than regular flowers. On the other hand, felt flowers always remain beautiful, require no maintenance, and are environmentally friendly. You will be able to enjoy them for a very long time!

products.title: Products
products.pleaseTryAgainLater: Please try again later or contact support.
products.introTitle: Handmade Felt Flowers for Special Moments
products.introDescription: Discover my unique collection of handmade felt flowers. Each piece is crafted with love and care, perfect for memorial pieces, wedding bouquets, and lasting memories. Sustainable, personal, and with attention to every detail.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this product?
dashboard.tryAgainLater: Please try again later or contact support.
dashboard.confirmMarkAsSoldTitle: Are you sure you want to mark this product as sold?
dashboard.confirmUndoSoldTitle: Are you sure you want to undo the sold status for this product?
dashboard.confirmMarkAsSoldDescription: This will set the product status to sold and make it unavailable for purchase.
dashboard.confirmUndoSoldDescription: This will set the product status back to active and make it available for purchase.
